emr_vis_nlp.model.mpqa_colon

Class Dataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • emr_vis_nlp.model.mpqa_colon.Dataset
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatasetMedColonDoclist

    public abstract class Dataset
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a set of documents loaded from disk. Is optionally accompanied by a schema datafile.
